MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L4 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Hilcrest Road, Daneville Road and surrounding areas. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09:31AM to make safe and complete repairs on an underground cable fault. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by midday today. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:35AM on 19th January 2021
